#summary Use Case: PostReminder
#labels UseCase,Teacher

==UseCases==


= PostReminder =


|| Use Case || PostReminder ||
||Identified || T4 ||
|| Description: || The PostReminder use case models Teacher posting a Reminder on VINL.||
||Actors|| Teacher||
|| Preconditions: || 1. Teacher must be successfully logged in with Teacher privileges via the LogIn use case. ||
||Flow of Events: ||1. The use case starts when Teacher selects Post Reminder.||
||                ||2. Teacher will be asked to select a class from list of options. ||
||                ||2.1 If Teacher selects a class, move on to step 3. ||
||                ||2.2        If Teacher fails to select class, error message will occur reflecting that a class has not been chosen.||
||                ||3. Teacher will be prompted to enter text.||
||                ||3.1 Teacher will enter desired message. ||
||                ||3.2 Teacher will enter a desired date and time for the reminder to appear. ||
||                ||3.3 Teacher will hit Post button. ||
||                ||4. If Teacher failed to enter text, date, and time, an error message will occur reflecting that notion. ||
||                ||5. Else Teacher will receive a message, “Reminder Successfully Posted” ||
||Post Condition:||1. Reminder will be posted to selected class. ||
||               ||2. Students in the selected class will be able to view Reminder via the ViewReminder use case.||
